video.title: Tarmac MicMac
video.synopsis: Back in the age when all animals could fly, the Hare brothers, Ned and Fred, decide to build an airport in their garden.

episodes.synopsis: The beavers trick Ned and Fred with a fake treasure map. / Looking for somewhere to hibernate, Boris falls asleep right in the middle of the runway.
episodes.title: Treasure Hunt / Do Not Disturb

episodes.synopsis: A couple of penguins' and a couple of crocodiles' suitcases have been switched. / The family receives a noise complaint during band practice.
episodes.title: You Have to Break a Few Eggs to Make an Airport / No Noise Boys

episodes.synopsis: Hulga the opera singer crash-lands on the runway after realizing she has a fear of flying. / Ned is convinced Cookie's in love with Moppet.
episodes.title: Fear of Flying / Kiss of Confusion

episodes.synopsis: Ned and Fred bet on a football match. / An unbearable smell is making all the travelers in the airport flee. It's Ned's feet!
episodes.title: Late for a Flight / Wrong Footed

episodes.synopsis: Ned builds a second runway that becomes the site of all sorts of strange events. / Ned and Fred find a bouquet of carrots with a note attached.
episodes.title: Haunted Runway / The Admirer

episodes.synopsis: Moppet hopes to win the medal for Employee of the Month. / Fred bumps into a penguin. Ned tells him it's Igor Penguinov, a brutal wrestling champion.
episodes.title: Moppet's Vacation / Igor Penguinov

episodes.synopsis: To avoid getting a bad mark from Miss Chihuahua during her inspection, Ned invites her to a big party. / Ned's sculpture is panned by art critics.
episodes.title: Love Hareport / Out of Control Tower

episodes.synopsis: Ned makes a bet with Dudule Beaver that he can beat him at a new video game. / Two famous rabbit cosmonauts crash-land at the airport.
episodes.title: Favors / Jumping on the Moon

episodes.synopsis: A sinister-looking dog asks Fred and Ned to watch his briefcase before his departure. / A couple of penguins come to take a tour of the airport.
episodes.title: Found Property / Under the Radar

episodes.synopsis: Ned and Fred are taking photos of the airport to make into a calendar. / This evening, the airport will celebrate Brothers' and Sisters' Day.
episodes.title: Led by the Nose / My Brother, the Hero

episodes.synopsis: Ned has lost his lucky-charm chewing gum. / Ned tries in vain to get Cookie to notice him.
episodes.title: The Lucky Charm Chewing Gum / Cookie Crumbles

episodes.synopsis: Ned is about to sign a contract with a businessman sheep to build an amusement park next to the airport. / Ned makes a stupid bet against Baboon.
episodes.title: Rabbity / To Each Their Own

episodes.synopsis: A commercial is being filmed at the airport. / After waking up from a horrible nightmare, Ned is convinced that Fred is going to abandon him.
episodes.title: The Graduate / Please Don't Go
